name: Quaker~Shaker
description:
Survive an earthquake and get to the rescue-copter before you die! This game incorporates the criteria "Shockwave" by involving an earthquake into the gameplay.  Made for JamGoJam DNA game jam 11

Controls: Rotate with A&D or The left/right arrows.  Kick off the ground by clicking, or hitting space or left shift.

To play the game, Unzip the zip file and launch QS.exe.

Also don't forget to customize your character in the options tab!

Used the free simple fade scene transition system from the unity asset store by FLATTUTORIALS:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/simple-fade-scene-transition-system-81753.
